20101224020327.000|20101224020328.000|CC1|NOTCH TODAY WITH MAIL BOMBINGS  
20101224020328.000|20101224020330.000|CC1|IN ROME.                        
20101224020330.000|20101224020331.000|CC1|THE TARGETS WERE A PAIR OF      
20101224020331.000|20101224020331.000|CC1|EMBASSIES IN THE ITALIAN        
20101224020331.000|20101224020336.000|CC1|CAPITAL.                        
20101224020336.000|20101224020338.000|CC1|AT LEAST TWO PEOPLE WERE WOUNDED
20101224020338.000|20101224020340.000|CC1|BY TODAY'S BOMBS, HIDDEN INSIDE 
20101224020340.000|20101224020341.000|CC1|PARCELS DELIVERED TO THE SWISS  
20101224020341.000|20101224020343.000|CC1|AND CHILEAN EMBASSIES.          
20101224020343.000|20101224020345.000|CC1|THE ITALIAN NEWS AGENCY ANSA    
20101224020345.000|20101224020348.000|CC1|REPORTED A NOTE WAS FOUND AT ONE
20101224020348.000|20101224020351.000|CC1|SITE SAYING "LONG LIVE ANARCHY."
20101224020351.000|20101224020353.000|CC1|JUST LAST MONTH, 14 PARCEL BOMBS
20101224020353.000|20101224020355.000|CC1|WERE SENT TO FOREIGN EMBASSIES  
20101224020355.000|20101224020357.000|CC1|IN ATHENS, GREECE.              
20101224020357.000|20101224020359.000|CC1|A GREEK ANARCHIST GROUP CLAIMED 
20101224020359.000|20101224020401.000|CC1|RESPONSIBILITY, AND URGED LIKE- 
20101224020401.000|20101224020402.000|CC1|MINDED MILITANTS ELSEWHERE TO   
20101224020402.000|20101224020404.000|CC1|FOLLOW SUIT.                    
20101224020404.000|20101224020406.000|CC1|THOUGH TODAY'S INCIDENTS IN ROME
20101224020406.000|20101224020407.000|CC1|WEREN'T THOUGHT TO BE AL QAEDA- 
20101224020407.000|20101224020409.000|CC1|INSPIRED, THEY ADDED TO JITTERS 
20101224020409.000|20101224020411.000|CC1|WORLDWIDE ABOUT POSSIBLE ACTS OF
20101224020411.000|20101224020414.000|CC1|TERROR OVER THE HOLIDAYS.       
20101224020414.000|20101224020415.000|CC1|LAST CHRISTMAS, A NIGERIAN MAN  
20101224020415.000|20101224020417.000|CC1|TRIED TO SET OFF A BOMB IN HIS  
20101224020417.000|20101224020418.000|CC1|UNDERWEAR ON A NORTHWEST        
20101224020418.000|20101224020419.000|CC1|AIRLINES PLANE FLYING IN TO     
20101224020419.000|20101224020422.000|CC1|DETROIT.                        
20101224020422.000|20101224020424.000|CC1|YESTERDAY, WHITE HOUSE COUNTER- 
20101224020424.000|20101224020426.000|CC1|TERRORISM ADVISOR JOHN BRENNAN  
20101224020426.000|20101224020427.000|CC1|TOLD REPORTERS                  
20101224020427.000|20101224020428.000|CC1|THE NATION'S SECURITY HAS       
20101224020428.000|20101224020429.000|CC1|IMPROVED SIGNIFICANTLY IN THE   
20101224020429.000|20101224020432.000|CC1|YEAR SINCE.                     
20101224020432.000|20101224020433.000|CC1|>> WE HAVE TAKEN STEPS TO ENSURE
20101224020433.000|20101224020435.000|CC1|THAT THAT TYPE OF PROBLEM DOES  
20101224020435.000|20101224020437.000|CC1|NOT HAPPEN AGAIN.               
20101224020437.000|20101224020438.000|CC1|SO ONE OF THE THINGS THAT       
20101224020438.000|20101224020439.000|CC1|PRESIDENT OBAMA HAS INSISTED    
20101224020439.000|20101224020441.000|CC1|THAT WE DO ON EACH OF THESE     
20101224020441.000|20101224020442.000|CC1|INCIDENTS IS TO TAKE A LOOK BACK
20101224020442.000|20101224020444.000|CC1|AND TO SEE WHERE THE SYSTEM     
20101224020444.000|20101224020446.000|CC1|WORKED WELL, WHERE IT FELL DOWN,
20101224020446.000|20101224020447.000|CC1|WHAT CHANGES WE COULD MAKE,     
20101224020447.000|20101224020448.000|CC1|EITHER IN INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY
20101224020448.000|20101224020451.000|CC1|OR IN BUSINESS PROCESSES.       
20101224020451.000|20101224020452.000|CC1|AND SO I'M CONFIDENT THAT THOSE 
20101224020452.000|20101224020455.000|CC1|DEFICIENCIES WE IDENTIFIED AS A 
20101224020455.000|20101224020456.000|CC1|RESULT OF PREVIOUS REVIEWS ARE  
20101224020456.000|20101224020457.000|CC1|BEING ADDRESSED AND THAT WE ARE 
20101224020457.000|20101224020458.000|CC1|IN A MUCH BETTER POSITION TODAY 
20101224020458.000|20101224020500.000|CC1|THAN WE WERE LAST YEAR AT THIS  
20101224020500.000|20101224020502.000|CC1|TIME.                           
20101224020502.000|20101224020503.000|CC1|>> Warner: TO BUTTRESS THAT,    
20101224020503.000|20101224020504.000|CC1|THE WHITE HOUSE RELEASED A LIST 
20101224020504.000|20101224020506.000|CC1|OF SECURITY ENHANCEMENTS MADE IN
20101224020506.000|20101224020507.000|CC1|THE PAST YEAR.                  
20101224020507.000|20101224020509.000|CC1|THEY INCLUDE NEW PROCEDURES FOR 
20101224020509.000|20101224020511.000|CC1|INFORMATION SHARING, ANALYSIS   
20101224020511.000|20101224020513.000|CC1|AND TERROR WATCH LISTS.         
20101224020513.000|20101224020515.000|CC1|ALSO CITED WERE THE FULL BODY   
20101224020515.000|20101224020516.000|CC1|SCANNERS AND AGGRESSIVE SEARCHES
20101224020516.000|20101224020519.000|CC1|AT U.S. AIRPORTS THAT HAVE      
20101224020519.000|20101224020520.000|CC1|GENERATED CONTROVERSY, AS WELL  
20101224020520.000|20101224020522.000|CC1|AS INTENSIFIED THOUGH NOT TOTAL 
20101224020522.000|20101224020525.000|CC1|SCREENING OF CARGO.             
20101224020525.000|20101224020527.000|CC1|STILL, THERE'VE BEEN FEARS,     
20101224020527.000|20101224020528.000|CC1|ESPECIALLY IN EUROPE, THAT A NEW
20101224020528.000|20101224020530.000|CC1|ATTACK MIGHT BE IMMINENT.       
20101224020530.000|20101224020532.000|CC1|THIS MONTH, IRAQI OFFICIALS     
20101224020532.000|20101224020533.000|CC1|WARNED THAT AL-QAEDA ELEMENTS   
20101224020533.000|20101224020535.000|CC1|WERE PLOTTING ATTACKS IN MAJOR  
20101224020535.000|20101224020539.000|CC1|EUROPEAN CITIES.                
20101224020539.000|20101224020540.000|CC1|ON DECEMBER 11, A SUICIDE BOMBER
20101224020540.000|20101224020542.000|CC1|SET OFF AN EXPLOSION DURING     
20101224020542.000|20101224020543.000|CC1|SATURDAY NIGHT SHOPPING IN      
20101224020543.000|20101224020545.000|CC1|DOWNTOWN STOCKHOLM, KILLING     
20101224020545.000|20101224020549.000|CC1|HIMSELF AND WOUNDING TWO OTHERS.
20101224020549.000|20101224020550.000|CC1|AND ON MONDAY, BRITISH POLICE   
20101224020550.000|20101224020552.000|CC1|ARRESTED A DOZEN MEN SUSPECTED  
20101224020552.000|20101224020553.000|CC1|OF PLANNING A LARGE-SCALE ATTACK
20101224020553.000|20101224020556.000|CC1|ON TARGETS THERE.               
20101224020556.000|20101224020557.000|CC1|U.S. OFFICIALS ARE ALSO ON ALERT
20101224020557.000|20101224020602.000|CC1|FOR HOME-GROWN THREATS,         
20101224020602.000|20101224020604.000|CC1|ESPECIALLY AFTER A NATURALIZED  
20101224020604.000|20101224020606.000|CC1|CITIZEN, BORN IN PAKISTAN, TRIED
20101224020606.000|20101224020607.000|CC1|TO SET OFF A CAR BOMB IN NEW    
20101224020607.000|20101224020611.000|CC1|YORK'S TIMES SQUARE LAST MAY.   
20101224020611.000|20101224020612.000|CC1|BRENNAN SAID WEDNESDAY          
20101224020612.000|20101224020614.000|CC1|AUTHORITIES ARE NOT AWARE OF ANY
20101224020614.000|20101224020616.000|CC1|PARTICULAR PLOT AT THE MOMENT.  
20101224020616.000|20101224020617.000|CC1|>> AS FAR AS SOMETHING SPECIFIC 
20101224020617.000|20101224020620.000|CC1|AND CREDIBLE, WE DON'T SEE THAT.
20101224020620.000|20101224020621.000|CC1|THERE IS A CONSTANT STREAM OF   
20101224020621.000|20101224020622.000|CC1|REPORTING THROUGHOUT THE COURSE 
20101224020622.000|20101224020623.000|CC1|OF THE YEAR ABOUT AL QAEDA'S    
20101224020623.000|20101224020625.000|CC1|PLANS.                          
20101224020625.000|20101224020625.000|CC1|SO SOMETIMES WE HAVE THAT       
20101224020625.000|20101224020626.000|CC1|STRATEGIC WARNING.              
20101224020626.000|20101224020627.000|CC1|WE'RE NOT GOING TO WAIT FOR A   
20101224020627.000|20101224020629.000|CC1|TACTICAL WARNING.               
20101224020629.000|20101224020630.000|CC1|WE'RE GOING TO BE POISED EVERY  
20101224020630.000|20101224020632.000|CC1|DAY.                            
20101224020632.000|20101224020633.000|CC1|>> Warner: IN THE MEANTIME,     
20101224020633.000|20101224020635.000|CC1|POLICE IN ROME WARNED MORE      
20101224020635.000|20101224020635.000|CC1|PARCEL BOMBS COULD STILL BE     
20101224020635.000|20101224020637.000|CC1|WORKING THEIR WAY THROUGH THE   
20101224020637.000|20101224020639.000|CC1|MAIL SERVICE.                   
20101224020639.000|20101224020641.000|CC1|ALL THIS, AT A TIME WHEN        
20101224020641.000|20101224020642.000|CC1|THOUSANDS OF PEOPLE ARE POURING 
20101224020642.000|20101224020642.000|CC1|INTO THE CITY FOR CHRISTMAS     
20101224020642.000|20101224020646.000|CC1|OBSERVANCES.                    
20101224020646.000|20101224020647.000|CC1|FOR AN ASSESSMENT OF ALL THIS,  
20101224020647.000|20101224020649.000|CC1|WE TURN TO: JOHN McLAUGHLIN, WHO
20101224020649.000|20101224020650.000|CC1|SERVED AS THE CIA'S DEPUTY      
20101224020650.000|20101224020652.000|CC1|DIRECTOR AND THEN ACTING        
20101224020652.000|20101224020654.000|CC1|DIRECTOR EARLIER THIS DECADE.   
20101224020654.000|20101224020656.000|CC1|HE NOW TEACHES AT THE JOHNS     
20101224020656.000|20101224020656.000|CC1|HOPKINS SCHOOL OF ADVANCED      
20101224020656.000|20101224020658.000|CC1|INTERNATIONAL STUDIES.          
20101224020658.000|20101224020700.000|CC1|AND RICHARD CLARKE, FORMER WHITE
20101224020700.000|20101224020702.000|CC1|HOUSE COUNTER-TERRORISM ADVISOR 
20101224020702.000|20101224020703.000|CC1|IN THE CLINTON AND EARLY GEORGE 
20101224020703.000|20101224020705.000|CC1|W. BUSH ADMINISTRATIONS.        
20101224020705.000|20101224020708.000|CC1|HE IS NOW A CONSULTANT.         
20101224020708.000|20101224020709.000|CC1|WELCOME BACK TO THE PROGRAM BOTH
20101224020709.000|20101224020710.000|CC1|OF YOU.                         
20101224020710.000|20101224020712.000|CC1|HOW SERIOUS IS THE TERRORISM    
20101224020712.000|20101224020713.000|CC1|THREAT TO AMERICANS TODAY       
20101224020713.000|20101224020715.000|CC1|BEGINNING WITH YOU, JOHN        
20101224020715.000|20101224020715.000|CC1|McLAUGHLIN, AS COMPARED TO A    
20101224020715.000|20101224020716.000|CC1|YEAR AGO.                       
20101224020716.000|20101224020718.000|CC1|>> I THINK IT REMAINS VERY      
20101224020718.000|20101224020720.000|CC1|SERIOUS IN THE SENSE THAT IF YOU
20101224020720.000|20101224020722.000|CC1|JUST LOOK OVER THE LAST YEAR OR 
20101224020722.000|20101224020724.000|CC1|SO, WE'VE SEEN INCREASING       
20101224020724.000|20101224020725.000|CC1|INVOLVEMENT BY AMERICAN CITIZENS
20101224020725.000|20101224020727.000|CC1|IN TERRORIST PLOTS.             
20101224020727.000|20101224020730.000|CC1|WE KNOW THAT AL QAEDA AFFILIATES
20101224020730.000|20101224020732.000|CC1|IN PARTICULAR IN PLACES LIKE    
20101224020732.000|20101224020733.000|CC1|YEMEN ARE ACTIVELY PLOTTING AND 
20101224020733.000|20101224020735.000|CC1|HAD SOME SUCCESS.               
20101224020735.000|20101224020737.000|CC1|THE PACKAGE BOMB THREAT THAT YOU
20101224020737.000|20101224020739.000|CC1|REFERRED TO, ALL OF THIS, I     
20101224020739.000|20101224020741.000|CC1|THINK, MEANS THAT WE STILL HAVE 
20101224020741.000|20101224020744.000|CC1|ARE VERY MUCH IN JEOPARDY HERE. 
20101224020744.000|20101224020745.000|CC1|>> Warner: VERY MUCH IN         
20101224020745.000|20101224020745.000|CC1|JEOPARDY.                       
20101224020745.000|20101224020747.000|CC1|AND DO YOU SEE THE THREAT       
20101224020747.000|20101224020748.000|CC1|EVOLVING IN THIS WAY?           
20101224020748.000|20101224020749.000|CC1|>> THE THREAT IS EVOLVING, AS   
20101224020749.000|20101224020750.000|CC1|JOHN SAID.                      
20101224020750.000|20101224020751.000|CC1|WE'RE NOW GETTING THESE         
20101224020751.000|20101224020752.000|CC1|SELF-ACTUATED AMERICANS WHO

20101224022114.000|20101224022116.000|CC1|>> THANK YOU, JUDY.             
20101224022116.000|20101224022117.000|CC1|>> Woodruff: JUST A QUICK       
20101224022117.000|20101224022118.000|CC1|CORRECTION, NOT ALL DIPLOMATIC

20101224022837.000|20101224022838.000|CC1|LOT OF OTHER FOLKS ARE GOING TO

20101224022839.000|20101224022841.000|CC1|WE THANK YOU VERY MUCH FOR      
20101224022841.000|20101224022842.000|CC1|COMING IN.                      
20101224022842.000|20101224022844.000|CC1|SECRETARY WILLIAM FITZGERALD, WE
20101224022844.000|20101224022853.000|CC1|APPRECIATE IT.                  
20101224022853.000|20101224022854.000|CC1|>> Warner: NOW, MAKING SCHOOLS  
20101224022854.000|20101224022855.000|CC1|SMALLER.

20101224022857.000|20101224022859.000|CC1|CHILDREN.                       
20101224022859.000|20101224022901.000|CC1|SPECIAL CORRESPONDENT JOHN      
20101224022901.000|20101224022903.000|CC1|TULENKO REPORTS FROM NEW YORK   
20101224022903.000|20101224022904.000|CC1|CITY, WHERE THE OUTGOING SCHOOLS
20101224022904.000|20101224022905.000|CC1|CHANCELLOR IS A BIG SUPPORTER OF
20101224022905.000|20101224022909.000|CC1|THE IDEA.                       
20101224022909.000|20101224022910.000|CC1|>> Reporter: TWO YEARS AGO, WHEN
20101224022910.000|20101224022915.000|CC1|JUSTIN MARTINEZ STARTED NINTH   
20101224022915.000|20101224022916.000|CC1|GRADE, HE WAS ONE OF 2,000      
20101224022916.000|20101224022917.000|CC1|STUDENTS AT BAYARD RUSTIN HIGH  
20101224022917.000|20101224022918.000|CC1|SCHOOL IN NEW YORK CITY.        
20101224022918.000|20101224022919.000|CC1|>> WHEN YOU WALKED THE HALLS,   
20101224022919.000|20101224022922.000|CC1|IT'S SO PACKED.                 
20101224022922.000|20101224022923.000|CC1|AND THEN IN THE CLASSROOMS, IT'S
20101224022923.000|20101224022924.000|CC1|SO CROWDED SOME KIDS DIDN'T HAVE
20101224022924.000|20101224022924.000|CC1|A SEAT.                         
20101224022924.000|20101224022925.000|CC1|SO YOU'RE STANDING UP, YOU'RE   
20101224022925.000|20101224022927.000|CC1|SITTING ON THE FLOOR, YOU'RE    
20101224022927.000|20101224022928.000|CC1|SITTING ON THE TEACHER'S DESK.  
20101224022928.000|20101224022930.000|CC1|THEY'RE SO MANY KIDS IN THE ROOM
20101224022930.000|20101224022931.000|CC1|THE TEACHER MIGHT THINK YOU'RE  
20101224022931.000|20101224022931.000|CC1|DOING GOOD, WHEN YOU MAY NOT    
20101224022931.000|20101224022932.000|CC1|EVEN UNDERSTAND WHAT'S GOING ON.
20101224022932.000|20101224022935.000|CC1|THAT'S HOW BAD IT WAS.          
20101224022935.000|20101224022936.000|CC1|>> Reporter: JUSTIN'S HIGH      
20101224022936.000|20101224022938.000|CC1|SCHOOL HAD A 50% GRADUATION     
20101224022938.000|20101224022939.000|CC1|RATE, BUT THE PROBLEMS THERE    
20101224022939.000|20101224022941.000|CC1|WENT DEEPER.                    
20101224022941.000|20101224022943.000|CC1|>> I ALMOST GOT SHOT.           
20101224022943.000|20101224022945.000|CC1|I WAS GOING TO MY EIGHTH PERIOD 
20101224022945.000|20101224022947.000|CC1|CLASSROOM, GOING UPSTAIRS, AND A
20101224022947.000|20101224022948.000|CC1|GANG APPROACHED ME AND STARTED  
20101224022948.000|20101224022950.000|CC1|ASKING ME QUESTIONS.            
20101224022950.000|20101224022951.000|CC1|AND AT THE END, THEY PUT A GUN  
20101224022951.000|20101224022952.000|CC1|IN MY FACE.                     
20101224022952.000|20101224022954.000|CC1|>> Reporter: WHAT DID YOU DO?   
20101224022954.000|20101224022955.000|CC1|>> I DIDN'T KNOW WHAT TO DO.    
20101224022955.000|20101224022959.000|CC1|I WAS IN SHOCK.                 
20101224022959.000|20101224023002.000|CC1|I DIDN'T WANT TO DIE.           
20101224023002.000|20101224023005.000|CC1|AND THEY KEPT TALKING AND ONE OF
20101224023005.000|20101224023009.000|CC1|THE KIDS ASKED SHOULD I PULL THE
20101224023009.000|20101224023011.000|CC1|TRIGGER AND HE TURNED AROUND,

20101224023015.000|20101224023016.000|CC1|>> Reporter: DID YOU GO BACK TO 
20101224023016.000|20101224023018.000|CC1|SCHOOL THE NEXT DAY?            
20101224023018.000|20101224023019.000|CC1|>> NO, I WENT TO THE PRECINCT   
20101224023019.000|20101224023020.000|CC1|AND FILED A REPORT TO GET OUT OF
20101224023020.000|20101224023023.000|CC1|THE SCHOOL.                     
20101224023023.000|20101224023025.000|CC1|>> Reporter: SHORTLY AFTER THAT 
20101224023025.000|20101224023026.000|CC1|HAPPENED, NEW YORK CITY SHUT    
20101224023026.000|20101224023028.000|CC1|DOWN JUSTIN'S SCHOOL.           
20101224023028.000|20101224023030.000|CC1|FOR THE LAST EIGHT YEARS, THE   
20101224023030.000|20101224023031.000|CC1|CITY HAS BEEN CLOSING LARGE,

20101224023032.000|20101224023038.000|CC1|HIGH SCHOOLS-- 26 TO DATE.

20101224023144.000|20101224023148.000|CC1|FALL THROUGH THE CRACKS.        
20101224023148.000|20101224023150.000|CC1|>> Reporter: SMALL SCHOOLS CAN  
20101224023150.000|20101224023152.000|CC1|DO THINGS LARGE SCHOOLS CANNOT.

20101224023153.000|20101224023155.000|CC1|DESIGNS ITS SCHEDULE SO THAT THE
20101224023155.000|20101224023157.000|CC1|STUDENTS IN EACH GRADE HAVE THE 
20101224023157.000|20101224023158.000|CC1|SAME LUNCH PERIOD AS THEIR      
20101224023158.000|20101224023200.000|CC1|TEACHERS.                       
20101224023200.000|20101224023202.000|CC1|>> SO A STUDENT IF HE'S FALLING

20101224023548.000|20101224023550.000|CC1|HEMPHILL, A LONGTIME WATCHER OF 
20101224023550.000|20101224023552.000|CC1|THE CITY'S PUBLIC SCHOOLS, THESE

20101224023553.000|20101224023555.000|CC1|THE DEPARTMENT CALLED THEM,

20101224023557.000|20101224023600.000|CC1|>> THE NEW SMALL SCHOOLS DIDN'T 
20101224023600.000|20101224023603.000|CC1|ACCEPT KIDS WHO WERE NEW TO THE 
20101224023603.000|20101224023604.000|CC1|COUNTRY OR KIDS WITH SPECIAL    
20101224023604.000|20101224023609.000|CC1|EDUCATION NEEDS.

20101224023621.000|20101224023623.000|CC1|RESOURCES TO HELP THEM.

20101224023631.000|20101224023633.000|CC1|AFTERWARD, WHEN EIGHT BECOME    
20101224023633.000|20101224023635.000|CC1|TARGETS FOR CLOSING.            
20101224023635.000|20101224023636.000|CC1|>> YOU KNOW, THERE ARE

20101224023637.000|20101224023638.000|CC1|BECAUSE THEY THOUGHT, "YOU KNOW,
20101224023638.000|20101224023640.000|CC1|WE HAD A GREAT SCHOOL EIGHT     
20101224023640.000|20101224023643.000|CC1|YEARS AGO, AND NOW WE HAVE A    
20101224023643.000|20101224023644.000|CC1|SCHOOL THAT HAS ALL SORTS OF    
20101224023644.000|20101224023645.000|CC1|PROBLEMS, BUT WE DON'T FEEL IT  
20101224023645.000|20101224023647.000|CC1|WAS OF OUR DOING."              
20101224023647.000|20101224023648.000|CC1|>> Reporter: MICHAEL MULGREW IS 
20101224023648.000|20101224023648.000|CC1|PRESIDENT OF THE LOCAL TEACHERS'
20101224023648.000|20101224023650.000|CC1|UNION.

20101224023652.000|20101224023653.000|CC1|TO STOP THE CITY FROM CLOSING   
20101224023653.000|20101224023656.000|CC1|ANOTHER 17 HIGH SCHOOLS.        
20101224023656.000|20101224023657.000|CC1|>> I KNOW THIS COULD HAVE BEEN

20101224024352.000|20101224024354.000|CC1|THE NORTH ULTIMATELY WANTS TO   
20101224024354.000|20101224024355.000|CC1|SEE THE SOUTH KOREAN GOVERNMENT 
20101224024355.000|20101224024356.000|CC1|ACT DECISIVELY IN THE FACE OF   
20101224024356.000|20101224024400.000|CC1|FURTHER PROVOCATIONS.           
20101224024400.000|20101224024401.000|CC1|>> ( translated ): SOUTH KOREA  
20101224024401.000|20101224024402.000|CC1|HAS BEHAVED LIKE A VENDING      
20101224024402.000|20101224024403.000|CC1|MACHINE FOR THE NORTH OVER THE  
20101224024403.000|20101224024404.000|CC1|PAST 10 YEARS.

20101224025146.000|20101224025148.000|CC1|SIGNED ON WITH THIS TREMENDOUS  
20101224025148.000|20101224025149.000|CC1|ROLLING RESPONSIBILITY THAT     
20101224025149.000|20101224025152.000|CC1|TELLING THAT STORY WOULD ENTAIL.
20101224025152.000|20101224025153.000|CC1|>> Brown: YOU FELT IT THEN?     
20101224025153.000|20101224025155.000|CC1|>> I FELT THE WEIGHT OF IT THEN.
20101224025155.000|20101224025157.000|CC1|BUT I GOT A LOT OF HELP VERY    
20101224025157.000|20101224025157.000|CC1|EARLY ON.                       
20101224025157.000|20101224025159.000|CC1|THE NEXT DAY I GOT A... I WAS   
20101224025159.000|20101224025200.000|CC1|CONTACTED BY THE DEPARTMENT OF  
20101224025200.000|20101224025203.000|CC1|DEFENSE AND THEY SAID "WE SEE   
20101224025203.000|20101224025204.000|CC1|WHERE YOU'RE GOING WITH THIS AND
20101224025204.000|20101224025207.000|CC1|WE SUSPECT YOU MIGHT NEED SOME  
20101224025207.000|20101224025207.000|CC1|HELP."                          
20101224025207.000|20101224025209.000|CC1|SO I WAS INVITED DOWN TO WALTER 
20101224025209.000|20101224025212.000|CC1|REED TO START TALKING WITH      
20101224025212.000|20101224025214.000|CC1|WARRIORS AND CAREGIVERS.        
20101224025214.000|20101224025215.000|CC1|>> Brown: SO WHEN YOU WENT      
20101224025215.000|20101224025216.000|CC1|THROUGH ALL THIS FINALLY, WHEN  
20101224025216.000|20101224025218.000|CC1|YOU WENT THROUGH ALL THIS 40    
20101224025218.000|20101224025219.000|CC1|YEARS OF STRIPS TO PUT THIS     
20101224025219.000|20101224025221.000|CC1|TOGETHER, DID YOU FEEL A        
20101224025221.000|20101224025224.000|CC1|COHESION TO THE TALE THAT YOU   
20101224025224.000|20101224025224.000|CC1|HAD PUT TOGETHER?

20101224025226.000|20101224025228.000|CC1|DAY BY DAY BY DAY AND YOU ADD UP
20101224025228.000|20101224025230.000|CC1|TO, WHAT DOES IT ADD UP TO IN 40
20101224025230.000|20101224025230.000|CC1|YEARS?                          
20101224025230.000|20101224025232.000|CC1|>> YES, IT SORT OF TOOK ME BY   
20101224025232.000|20101224025234.000|CC1|SURPRISE THAT IT HAD A KIND OF  
20101224025234.000|20101224025235.000|CC1|NOVELISTIC TOTALITY THAT

20101224025237.000|20101224025239.000|CC1|I'M A SHORT ORDER COOK.

20101224025243.000|20101224025246.000|CC1|DO THAT IN THE MOST ERRATIC WAY

20101224025246.000|20101224025248.000|CC1|I'LL DO... I DO A WEEK AT A TIME

20101224025249.000|20101224025251.000|CC1|STRIP AND THEN VILE TO REVERSE  
20101224025251.000|20101224025253.000|CC1|ENGINEER TO FIGURE OUT HOW I GOT
20101224025253.000|20101224025255.000|CC1|TO IT.
